meanings.definition: Cybernations: a group of nations or countries that exist in cyberspace.
meanings.sent1: The online game had various cybernations competing for dominance.
meanings.sent2: Many cybernations have their own virtual currencies.
meanings.sent3: The cybernations held a virtual summit to discuss peace agreements.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cybernations, alliances can shift as quickly as lines of code.
meanings.sent5: The concept of cybernations blurs the line between reality and virtual worlds.

meanings.definition: Cybernations: the act or process of forming alliances or relationships between nations online.
meanings.sent1: Diplomacy plays a crucial role in cybernations.
meanings.sent2: The forum was buzzing with discussions about cybernations.
meanings.sent3: The cybernations' online treaties were sealed with digital signatures.
meanings.sent4: The power dynamics in cybernations can be as complex as in the physical world.
meanings.sent5: Negotiating trade deals is a key aspect of cybernations.
